seoTitle: Emmett's Soul Kitchen - Authentic Soul Food
seoDescription: Enjoy authentic soul food at Emmett's Soul Kitchen. Delicious dishes, exceptional service, and an unforgettable dining experience.

menuPage.title: Soul Food Menu
menuPage.subtitle: Meat plus 1, 2 or 3 Sides

meats.catfishDesc: Golden and crispy catfish fillets seasoned to perfection.
meats.chickenDesc: Our signature golden fried chicken, juicy and flavorful.
meats.meatloafDesc: Homemade meatloaf topped with savory glaze.
meats.liversDesc: Tender chicken livers perfectly seasoned and fried.
meats.gizzardsDesc: Crispy fried gizzards, a true soul food classic.
meats.chopsDesc: Tender pork chops smothered in rich onion gravy.
meats.bakedChickenDesc: Slow-baked seasoned chicken served over fluffy rice.
meats.ribTipsDesc: Tender rib tips smothered in our signature BBQ sauce.
meats.oxtailsDesc: Fall-off-the-bone tender oxtails in a rich and savory gravy.
meats.friedChopsDesc: Perfectly seasoned and fried pork chops.

menuPage.orderNotice: All meals come with your choice of meat and 1, 2 or 3 sides. Cornbread included with every meal.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: Learn our story, our mission, and what makes our soul food special.
aboutPage.legacyTitle: A Legacy of Love and Flavor
aboutPage.storyParagraph1: Ms. Emmett's Soul Food was built on family recipes, deep Southern roots, and a passion for feeding people well. Every meal is cooked fresh, seasoned with love, and served with pride.
aboutPage.storyParagraph2: Our kitchen continues the tradition of authentic soul food that has been passed down through generations. From crispy fried chicken to creamy mac & cheese, every dish tells a story of heritage and home.
aboutPage.storyParagraph3: We believe food is more than just sustenance‚Äîit's a way to bring people together, create memories, and share love. That's why we put our heart into every dish we serve.
aboutPage.missEmmettText: The secret to Miss Emmett's soul food seasoning is simple ‚Äî she cooks for you like you're family.
aboutPage.missEmmettText2: Miss Emmett is in the kitchen every day, personally cooking, just as her father taught her growing up. This food is prepared with care, tradition, and pride ‚Äî the same way it's always been done.
aboutPage.missionDesc: Delivering authentic soul food that feels like home ‚Äî every dish, every time. We are committed to preserving the flavors and traditions that make Southern cooking so special, while serving our community with warmth and hospitality.
aboutPage.dailyDesc: Every dish is prepared fresh daily using time-tested recipes.
aboutPage.qualityDesc: We use only the best ingredients to create authentic flavors.
aboutPage.recipesDesc: Passed down through generations, our recipes are authentic.
aboutPage.shortcutsDesc: We take our time to do it right‚Äîbecause you deserve the best.

cateringPage.title: Catering Services
cateringPage.subtitle: Bring the soul to your next event! From intimate gatherings to large celebrations, we'll make your occasion unforgettable with authentic soul food.
cateringPage.availableDesc: We're preparing catering packages to bring Ms. Emmett's authentic soul food to your special events. For inquiries, contact us directly!
cateringPage.perfectFor: Perfect for family gatherings, birthday parties, and small get-togethers
cateringPage.idealFor: Ideal for office parties, church events, and celebrations
cateringPage.forWeddings: For weddings, corporate events, and large celebrations
cateringPage.consultationDesc: We'll contact you within 24 hours to discuss your event.
